title: Blazing Saddles (Mel Brooks) [1974] Eng, Ger, Spa + multisub  DV
description:
Please seed!

Blazing Saddles [1974]

To ruin a western town, a corrupt political boss appoints a black sheriff,
who promptly becomes his most formidable adversary. 

Starring: Cleavon Little, Gene Wilder and Slim Pickens
Director: Mel Brooks

NOTE: In the main menu there is no button to push to start the film. You
      have to push "Jump to a scene" which takes you to the scene index.
      Push scenes 1-6 and then 1 "Blazing Saddles- credits and title song"
      and the film starts. This is how I got to do it using VLC.


Video: MPEG2PAL 16:9 720x576

Audio: English, German and Castellano Dolby AC3/1
